name: Phobos (itch) (Bullhipp)
description:
Save your clients from fear in their lives with your healing potions  and get the highest score of all!!

*Our team is made up of students from Jaume I University in the degree of Video Game Design and Development. 

*This game was made to show what we are able to do by programming and designing video games. 

Controls
  • Keyboard Only
    • Move - WASD or Arrows
    • Run- left shift
    • Take/Give Potions- Space
Credits
  • Alejandro Toro Urdaneta  - Code Chief, Music & Art
  • Jesus Huguet Orosia - Code & Tipography
  • Margarita Gaya Hinsuk  - Art Chief 
  • Marc Pitarch - Code & Music
  • Jaime Perez Villena - Art
  • Victor Izquierdo Alegre - Art
Fixed Issues

*It wasnt clear where to mix the potions so now it is in the instructions as well.

Issues

*Download issue, It might trigger your antivirus but dont worry its just for the licenses.
